item.author: example@example.com (Author Demo)
item.description:
The paige/code shortcode displays code.

Basic

Code:

{{< paige/code >}}
q = 'q = %r; print(q %% q)'; print(q % q)
{{< /paige/code >}}

Result:

q = 'q = %r; print(q %% q)'; print(q % q)

Code:

{{< paige/code >}}
                       ---
                    -        --
                --( /     \ )XXXXXXXXXXXXX
            --XXX(   O   O  )XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX-
           /XXX(       U     )        XXXXXXX\
         /XXXXX(              )--   XXXXXXXXXXX\
        /XXXXX/ (      O     )   XXXXXX   \XXXXX\
        XXXXX/   /            XXXXXX   \   \XXXXX----
        XXXXXX  /          XXXXXX         \  ----  -
---     XXX  /          XXXXXX      \           ---
  --  --  /      /\  XXXXXX            /     ---=
    -        /    XXXXXX              '--- XXXXXX
      --\/XXX\ XXXXXX                      /XXXXX
        \XXXXXXXXX                        /XXXXX/
         \XXXXXX                         /XXXXX/
           \XXXXX--  /                -- XXXX/
            --XXXXXXX---------------  XXXXX--
               \XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX-
                 --XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX-
{{< /paige/code >}}

Result:

                       ---
                    -        --
                --( /     \ )XXXXXXXXXXXXX
            --XXX(   O   O  )XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX-
           /XXX(       U     )        XXXXXXX\
         /XXXXX(              )--   XXXXXXXXXXX\
        /XXXXX/ (      O     )   XXXXXX   \XXXXX\
        XXXXX/   /            XXXXXX   \   \XXXXX----
        XXXXXX  /          XXXXXX         \  ----  -
---     XXX  /          XXXXXX      \           ---
  --  --  /      /\  XXXXXX            /     ---=
    -        /    XXXXXX              '--- XXXXXX
      --\/XXX\ XXXXXX                      /XXXXX
        \XXXXXXXXX                        /XXXXX/
         \XXXXXX                         /XXXXX/
           \XXXXX--  /                -- XXXX/
            --XXXXXXX---------------  XXXXX--
               \XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX-
                 --XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX-

Lang parameter

Code:

{{< paige/code lang="c" >}}
float Q_rsqrt( float number )
{
	long i;
	float x2, y;
	const float threehalfs = 1.5F;

	x2 = number * 0.5F;
	y  = number;
	i  = * ( long * ) &y;
	i  = 0x5f3759df - ( i >> 1 );
	y  = * ( float * ) &i;
	y  = y * ( threehalfs - ( x2 * y * y ) );

	return y;
}
{{< /paige/code >}}

Result:

float Q_rsqrt( float number )
{
	long i;
	float x2, y;
	const float threehalfs = 1.5F;

	x2 = number * 0.5F;
	y  = number;
	i  = * ( long * ) &y;
	i  = 0x5f3759df - ( i >> 1 );
	y  = * ( float * ) &i;
	y  = y * ( threehalfs - ( x2 * y * y ) );

	return y;
}

Options parameter

Code:

{{< paige/code options="linenos=true,hl_lines=10" >}}
float Q_rsqrt( float number )
{
	long i;
	float x2, y;
	const float threehalfs = 1.5F;

	x2 = number * 0.5F;
	y  = number;
	i  = * ( long * ) &y;
	i  = 0x5f3759df - ( i >> 1 );
	y  = * ( float * ) &i;
	y  = y * ( threehalfs - ( x2 * y * y ) );

	return y;
}
{{< /paige/code >}}

	y  = number;
	i  = * ( long * ) &y;

	y  = * ( float * ) &i;

	return y;

Unescape parameter

Code:

{{< paige/code unescape=false >}}
{{< paige/request "[...]" >}}
{{< /paige/code >}}

Result:

float Q_rsqrt( float number )
{
	long i;
	float x2, y;
	const float threehalfs = 1.5F;

	x2 = number * 0.5F;
	y  = number;
	i  = * ( long * ) &y;
	i  = 0x5f3759df - ( i >> 1 );
	y  = * ( float * ) &i;
	y  = y * ( threehalfs - ( x2 * y * y ) );

	return y;
}

Code:

{{< paige/code unescape=true >}}
{{< paige/request "[...]" >}}
{{< /paige/code >}}

Result:

float Q_rsqrt( float number )
{
	long i;
	float x2, y;
	const float threehalfs = 1.5F;

	x2 = number * 0.5F;
	y  = number;
	i  = * ( long * ) &y;
	i  = 0x5f3759df - ( i >> 1 );
	y  = * ( float * ) &i;
	y  = y * ( threehalfs - ( x2 * y * y ) );

	return y;
}

item.author: example@example.com (Author Demo)
item.description:
The paige/email shortcode hides e-mail addresses from crawlers.

Address parameter

Code:

{{% paige/email address="example@example.com" %}}E-mail me{{% /paige/email %}}

Result:

E-mail me
item.title: Email

item.author: example@example.com (Author Demo)
item.description:
The paige/figure shortcode displays content in a figure.

Basic

Code:

{{< paige/figure >}}
Hickory dickory dock.<br>
The mouse ran up the clock.<br>
The clock struck one,<br>
The mouse ran down,<br>
Hickory dickory dock.
{{< /paige/figure >}}

Result:

Caption parameter

Code:

{{< paige/figure caption="Hickory Dickory Dock" >}}
Hickory dickory dock.<br>
The mouse ran up the clock.<br>
The clock struck one,<br>
The mouse ran down,<br>
Hickory dickory dock.
{{< /paige/figure >}}

Result:

Float parameter

Code:

{{< paige/figure float="start" >}}
Hickory dickory dock.<br>
The mouse ran up the clock.<br>
The clock struck one,<br>
The mouse ran down,<br>
Hickory dickory dock.
{{< /paige/figure >}}

item.author: example@example.com (Author Demo)
item.description:
The paige/quote shortcode displays a quotation.

Basic

Code:

{{< paige/quote >}}
Hickory dickory dock.<br>
The mouse ran up the clock.<br>
The clock struck one,<br>
The mouse ran down,<br>
Hickory dickory dock.
{{< /paige/quote >}}

Result:

Hickory dickory dock.
The mouse ran up the clock.
The clock struck one,
The mouse ran down,
Hickory dickory dock.

Cite

Code:

{{< paige/quote cite="Hickory Dickory Dock" >}}
Hickory dickory dock.<br>
The mouse ran up the clock.<br>
The clock struck one,<br>
The mouse ran down,<br>
Hickory dickory dock.
{{< /paige/quote >}}

Result:

Hickory dickory dock.
The mouse ran up the clock.
The clock struck one,
The mouse ran down,
Hickory dickory dock.
Hickory Dickory Dock

Figure

Code:

{{< paige/figure caption="Hickory Dickory Dock" >}}
{{< paige/quote >}}
Hickory dickory dock.<br>
The mouse ran up the clock.<br>
The clock struck one,<br>
The mouse ran down,<br>
Hickory dickory dock.
{{< /paige/quote >}}
{{< /paige/figure >}}

Result:
item.title: Quote

The paige/tabs shortcode displays content in tabs.

Basic

Code:

{{< paige/tabs >}}
{{< paige/tabs/buttons >}}
{{< paige/tabs/button >}}JSON{{< /paige/tabs/button >}}
{{< paige/tabs/button >}}TOML{{< /paige/tabs/button >}}
{{< paige/tabs/button >}}YAML{{< /paige/tabs/button >}}
{{< /paige/tabs/buttons >}}
{{< paige/tabs/panes >}}
{{< paige/tabs/pane >}}
{{< paige/code lang="json" >}}
{"foo": 123}
{{< /paige/code >}}
{{< /paige/tabs/pane >}}
{{< paige/tabs/pane >}}
{{< paige/code lang="toml" >}}
foo = 123
{{< /paige/code >}}
{{< /paige/tabs/pane >}}
{{< paige/tabs/pane >}}
{{< paige/code lang="yaml" >}}
foo: 123
{{< /paige/code >}}
{{< /paige/tabs/pane >}}
{{< /paige/tabs/panes >}}
{{< /paige/tabs >}}
